Object.Name: CmdhLimits
Object.Description1: This Object represents limits for CMDH related parameter values.

Item.Name: Order
Item.Description: Contains index indicating in which order the concerned CmdhLimits Object Instance will be treated by the CSE to determine a value for the limit parameters.

Item.Name: RequestOrigin
Item.Description: List of zero or more Local AE-IDs, App-IDs, or the strings “localAE” or “thisCSE”

Item.Name: RequestContext
Item.Description: Represents the Dynamic Context condition under which CMDH parameter limits defined inside the concerned CmdhLimits Object Instance is applicable.

Item.Name: RequestContextNotificatio
Item.Description: Contains true/false flag indicating whether or not notification procedures apply.

Item.Name: RequestCharacteristics
Item.Description: Represents conditions pertaining to the request itself, (e.g. the requested Response Type ) than needs to be matched

Item.Name: LimitsEventCategory
Item.Description: Allowed values for the Event Category parameter in a request of any of the Originators indicated in the requestOrigin attribute.

Item.Name: LimitsRequestExpTime
Item.Description: Defines a range of values for the Request Expiration Time parameter for a request of any Originator indicated in the requestOrigin Resource Inst 0 : minTime Inst 1: maxTime

Item.Name: LimitsResultExpTime
Item.Description: Defines a range of values for the Result Expiration Time parameter for a request of any Originator indicated in the requestOrigin Resource Inst 0 : minTime Inst 1: maxTime

Item.Name: LimitsOptExpTime
Item.Description: Defines a range of values for the Operation Expiration Time parameter for a request of any Originator indicated in the requestOrigin Resource Inst 0 : minTime Inst 1: maxTime

Item.Name: LimitsRespPersistence
Item.Description: Defines a range of values for the Result Persistence parameter for a request of any Originator indicated in the requestOrigin Resource Inst 0 : minTime Inst 1: maxTime

Item.Name: LimitsDelAggregation
Item.Description: Contains the permitted settings of the DeliveryAggregation parameter of request primitives. '0' means 'False' '1' means 'True' '0 1' means 'False' or 'True'
